LanguageData.DMS_Mech_Dogge.label: Dogge
LanguageData.DMS_Mech_Dogge.description: A four-legged robot dog that provides forward reconnaissance and urban combat support during armed operations, can be equipped with small-caliber firearms or flamethrowers to provide certain containment capabilities.
LanguageData.DMS_Mech_Dogge.comps.CompMultipleTurretG: Toggle turret to manual control mode to prevent unnecessary shooting.
LanguageData.DMS_Mech_Dogge.tools.head.label: head
LanguageData.DMS_Mech_Falcon.label: Falcon
LanguageData.DMS_Mech_Falcon.description: A heavy-duty tri-rotor drone for coordination in field recon and anti-tank strikes.
LanguageData.DMS_Mech_Falcon.tools.head.label: head
LanguageData.DMS_Mech_Noctula.label: Noctula
LanguageData.DMS_Mech_Noctula.description: Stealth operation command-relay Noctula (nicknamed "Night bat") is a command-relay variant of the Falcon tri-rotor.
LanguageData.DMS_Mech_Noctula.tools.head.label: head
